item.title: 印度股市情绪低迷，"小 "并不代表 "美
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 普拉博沃抨击 "小皇帝"，印尼预算反弹加剧
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）加倍努力推动削减开支，并重新分配资金用于其标志性社会项目，他批评了 "小皇帝 "的反对意见，尽管人们越来越担心削减开支可能会拖累东南亚最大的经济体。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto doubled down on a push to slash spending and reallocate funds to his signature social programs, criticizing opposition from “little kings” even as concerns rise that the cuts could prove a drag on Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 埃利奥特持有菲利普斯 66 公司 25 亿美元以上的股份
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引知情人士的话报道，激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）已持有炼油商菲利普斯 66 超过 25 亿美元的股份，并计划要求该公司考虑改变运营方式，以提振其股价。【原文：Activist investor Elliott Investment Management has built a more than $2.5 billion stake in oil refiner Phillips 66, and plans to ask the firm to consider operational changes to boost its stock, Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 风暴向澳大利亚袭来，关键铁矿石港口清空船只
item.description: 随着热带低压向西澳大利亚海岸移动，黑德兰港的铁矿石出口中心已开始清理船只，这是该地区今年与风暴有关的一系列干扰中的最新一次。【原文：The iron ore export hub of Port Hedland has started clearing vessels as a tropical low tracks toward the Western Australian coast, the latest in a series of storm-related disruptions for the region this year.】

item.title: 斯利姆的 Carso 公司与 Pemex 公司对拉卡奇油田的海底管道进行评估
item.description: 拉丁美洲首富卡洛斯-斯利姆（Carlos Slim）正在评估如何推进与墨西哥国营石油公司合作的雄心勃勃的深水天然气钻探项目，理由是从 900 多米深的水下开采天然气所固有的技术挑战。【原文：Latin America’s richest person, Carlos Slim, is evaluating how to move forward with an ambitious deepwater gas-drilling project with Mexico’s state oil company, citing the technical challenges inherent in lifiting gas from under more than 900 meters of water.】

item.title: 英国央行曼恩称需求疲软大于通胀风险，英国《金融时报》报道
item.description: 英国央行的一位投票委员上周支持大幅降息，他在接受《金融时报》采访时表示，随着消费者缩减开支，企业将很难提高价格。【原文：A Bank of England voting member who backed an outsized interest rate cut last week sees companies struggling to raise prices as consumers pull back on spending, according to an interview with the Financial Times.】

item.title: 新西兰考虑是否放宽外国购房禁令
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）表示，新西兰政府正在考虑是否放宽对外国人购买住宅房产的禁令。【原文：New Zealand’s government is considering whether to relax a ban on foreigners buying residential property, Finance Minister Nicola Willis said.】

item.title: Cybereason 首席执行官就融资计划起诉姆努钦和软银基金
item.description: Cybereason Inc. 首席执行官起诉了两位投资者，即前财政部长史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）和软银愿景基金（SoftBank Vision Fund），指控他们拒绝了多达 1.5 亿美元的急需资金注入计划，使公司面临破产风险。【原文：The chief executive officer of Cybereason Inc. sued two investors — former Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin and the SoftBank Vision Fund — accusing them of putting the company at risk of bankruptcy by rejecting multiple plans for a much-needed capital infusion of as much as $150 million.】

item.title: 哥伦布麦金农将以 27 亿美元从 KKR 收购 Kito Crosby
item.description: 哥伦布麦金农公司已同意从 KKR & Co.手中收购机械制造商 Kito Crosby，交易价值 27 亿美元。【原文：Columbus McKinnon Corp. has agreed to buy machinery maker Kito Crosby from KKR & Co. in a transaction valued at $2.7 billion.】

item.title: 淡马锡支持的 Cuscaden 寻求将 Paragon 房地产投资信托基金私有化
item.description: Cuscaden Peak Pte.旗下的一家公司正在寻求将 Paragon REIT 私有化，这日益显示出新加坡房地产投资信托行业所面临的逆风。【原文：A unit of Cuscaden Peak Pte. is seeking to take Paragon REIT private, in a growing sign of the headwinds facing Singapore’s real estate investment trust sector.】

item.title: 特朗普推动避险需求，黄金再创新高
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对所有美国进口钢铁和铝征收 25% 的关税后，黄金创下了历史新高，这加剧了全球市场的不确定性，从而推动了避险需求。【原文：Gold hit a record high after President Donald Trump imposed 25% tariffs on all US steel and aluminum imports, adding to uncertainty across global markets that’s boosting demand for havens.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油输出减少抵消特朗普关税影响，石油保持涨势
item.description: 由于俄罗斯原油供应趋紧，盖过了对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普扩大关税影响的担忧，石油价格在创下近四周最大涨幅后回稳。【原文：Oil steadied after the biggest advance in almost four weeks as tighter Russian crude supply overshadowed concerns over the fallout from President Donald Trump’s expanding tariffs.】

item.title: 债券收益率低迷，基差交易在中国大受欢迎
item.description: 中国的债券交易商急于提高收益，正在转向一种利用现货和期货价格之间微小差异的策略。【原文：Bond traders in China, desperate to boost their returns, are turning to a strategy that exploits small differences between spot and futures prices.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费者信心复苏因预算紧缩而停滞不前
item.description: 澳大利亚消费者信心指数本月变化不大，因为去年下半年的复苏出现了停滞迹象，这反映了持续的生活成本压力和日益加剧的全球不确定性。【原文：Australia’s consumer confidence remained little changed this month as a recovery through the second half of last year showed signs of stalling, reflecting ongoing cost of living pressures and mounting global uncertainty.】

item.title: 软银为 5000 亿美元人工智能推进计划探索高额债务融资
item.description: 几周前，软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）创始人孙正义（Masayoshi Son）与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）共同揭开了 "星际之门计划"（Stargate Project）的神秘面纱。现在，孙正义正在考虑如何支付这笔费用。【原文：A few weeks ago, SoftBank Group Corp. founder Masayoshi Son stood alongside US President Donald Trump to unveil the Stargate Project, an artificial intelligence venture with OpenAI that could cost $500 billion or more. Now Son is figuring out how to pay for it.】

item.title: 中国投资者流入 190 亿美元推动香港股市上涨
item.description: 中国投资者正在助推港股牛市，今年向这个金融中心投入了近 1,500 亿港元（约合 193 亿美元），是 2024 年同期的七倍多。尽管今年的春节假期提前，减少了交易天数，但这一情况依然存在。【原文：Chinese investors are helping to drive a bull run in Hong Kong shares, plowing almost HK$150 billion ($19.3 billion) into the financial hub this year, more than seven times the amount they added during the same period in 2024. That’s despite an earlier Chinese New Year holiday reducing the number of trading days this year.】

item.title: 贝恩、Endeavour 旗下医疗器械公司 Kestra 申请 IPO
item.description: Kestra 医疗技术有限公司已申请首次公开募股，其收入增长了近两倍。【原文：Kestra Medical Technologies Ltd. has filed for an initial public offering, showing revenue growth that nearly tripled.】

item.title: 特朗普对钢铁和铝征收 25% 的关税，贸易战愈演愈烈
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普下令对进口钢铁和铝征收 25% 的关税，这是他为保护在政治上具有重要意义的美国产业而做出的努力的升级，其征税措施打击了美国的一些最亲密盟友。【原文：President Donald Trump ordered a 25% tariff on steel and aluminum imports, escalating his efforts to protect politically important US industries with levies hitting some of the country’s closest allies.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将因美国拂袖而去的关税而上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在美国交易员摒弃对关税威胁的担忧，转而关注美联储的评论和通胀数据之后，亚洲股市将上扬。美元走强，黄金创下历史纪录。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to advance after US traders looked past concerns over tariff threats and toward Federal Reserve comments and inflation data. The dollar strengthened and gold hit a record.】

item.title: 阿尔巴内塞称特朗普将考虑豁免澳大利亚关税
item.description: 澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴内塞说，唐纳德-特朗普总统在电话中同意考虑豁免澳大利亚对美国计划征收的钢铝关税。【原文：Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said President Donald Trump agreed to consider an exemption for Australia from planned US tariffs on steel and aluminum during a telephone call.】

item.title: 对冲基金通过 "无限制 "收费攫取了客户的大量收益
item.description:
对主要对冲基金的监管文件进行的分析表明，近年来它们的转嫁费用清单出现了爆炸性增长。【原文：

An analysis of the major hedge funds' regulatory filings shows their list of passthrough expenses has exploded in recent years.

】

item.title: 华为通过将智能手表注册为医疗设备促进其销售
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.）在中国消费者消费低迷的情况下，找到了一种不太可能的方法来促进其最新智能手表的销售：将其注册为医疗设备。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. has found an unlikely way to boost sales of its latest smartwatches in the face of sluggish consumer spending in China: by registering them as medical devices.】

item.title: 墨西哥湾炼油商对水汪汪的墨西哥石油望而却步，这是对墨西哥国家石油公司的打击
item.description: 墨西哥湾沿岸的美国炼油厂拒绝从墨西哥发货，转而向哥伦比亚和加拿大发货，因为他们抱怨墨西哥石油公司越来越多地运送不适合制造汽油和柴油的原油。【原文：US oil refiners along the Gulf Coast are snubbing shipments from Mexico and instead turning to Colombia and Canada amid complaints that Petroleos Mexicanos is increasingly delivering crude that’s unfit to make gasoline and diesel.】

item.title: CFPB 的混乱使未来的金融科技和银行监管受到质疑
item.description: 不到两个月前，美国消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）还在对全球最大的几家公司提起诉讼，一周之内就起诉了摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）、美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）和沃尔玛（Walmart Inc.本周一，该机构总部关闭，工作人员被要求在家办公，其网站也出现了链接中断的情况。【原文：Less than two months ago, the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau was pumping out lawsuits against some of the world’s biggest firms, suing JPMorgan Chase & Co., Bank of America Corp. and Walmart Inc. within a single week. On Monday, the agency’s headquarters were closed, staffers were told to work from home and its website bore a broken link.】

item.title: 大宗商品交易下滑，麦格理利润变化不大
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）本财年前三季度利润持平，原因是其大宗商品交易部门的业务持续下滑，尽管其资产管理部门 "大幅 "增长。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd.’s profit was flat for the first three quarters of the fiscal year as business in its commodities trading arm continued to slip even as its asset management unit jumped “substantially.”】

item.title: 坎耶-维斯特在超级碗广告之后在 Shopify 上出售纳粹标志衬衫
item.description: 说唱歌手坎耶-韦斯特（Kanye West，人称 "Ye"）在 "超级碗 "期间打出广告，在 Shopify 公司托管的网站上销售纳粹标志衬衫。【原文：A site advertised during the Super Bowl by the rapper Kanye West, known as Ye, is selling swastika shirts on a site hosted by Shopify Inc.】

item.title: 马里开始征收手机使用税以资助反恐斗争
item.description: 马里对手机语音通话和手机取款征税，以支持其打击伊斯兰叛乱的斗争。【原文：Mali has introduced taxes on mobile voice calls and mobile-money withdrawals to support its fight against an Islamic insurgency that’s threatening to take over part of the country.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，马斯克领导的集团出价 974 亿美元收购 OpenAI 控制权
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，由埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的一个投资者集团正在出价 974 亿美元收购控制 ChatGPT 创造者 OpenAI 的非营利组织。【原文：A group of investors led by Elon Musk is offering $97.4 billion to buy the nonprofit that controls ChatGPT creator OpenAI, the Wall Street Journal reported Monday.】

item.title: 泰珀放弃中国赌注，不惧刺激政策推动的涨势消退
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者大卫-泰珀（David Tepper）上个季度增持了与中国有关的股票和交易所交易基金，显示出他对中国这个世界第二大经济体的信心，即使刺激经济的反弹势头已经减弱。【原文：Billionaire investor David Tepper ramped up his stake in China-related stocks and exchange-traded funds last quarter, showing confidence in the world’s second-largest economy even as a stimulus-fueled rally lost momentum.】

item.title: 华尔街银行谋划加密货币未来，押注 IPO 热潮
item.description: 在保持观望之后，华尔街一些最大的银行正在谋划如何赢得更多的加密货币业务，赌唐纳德-特朗普总统对该行业的支持会掀起一股首次公开募股、股票销售和可转换债券的浪潮。【原文：After staying on the sidelines, some of Wall Street’s biggest banks are plotting how to win more crypto business, betting President Donald Trump’s embrace of the industry unleashes a wave of IPOs, share sales and convertible bonds.】
